messages.subject: My Decision
messages.msgSnippet: Okay. I ve read all the posts and have made a decision. Ned has been a major disruption on this list for about a month now, and he shows no signs of listening
messages.messageBody:
Okay. I've read all the posts and have made a decision.

Ned has been a major disruption on this list for about a month now,
and he shows no signs of listening to anyone's pleas to stop being
disruptive. He seems quite content in his role, so I'm going to ban
him from posting to this list for a while. He can read posts, but he
won't be able to post replies. I'm sure he'll go off now and tell
anyone who'll listen on other lists about how controlling and
coercive and manipulative and unfair I'm being, but so be it.

If anyone wants to discuss this decision with me my address is
HEM-Editor@...

Helen
